forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
